title: Graduate-Level Advanced Science Curriculum Through MOOC-Integrated Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic theories and research methodologies in the field of science
context.additional_context: Flexible learning design for working professionals, enhancing self-directed learning through digital devices.

learning_goals: By integrating MOOC platforms with offline classes, learners understand over 80% of the latest research trends in science fields
In blended learning environments, learners resolve over 70% of complex scientific problems through interactions with peers and instructors
Formative assessments diagnose learning gaps in real-time and establish improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
